title: Website design for life-management and personal development software
desc: We are inviting a UI designer for creating a new design of the website for life-management and personal development software Biario ([url removed, login to view]). The new website will be entirely devoted to the life-management system. Website design will be aimed to the current version of Biario with future perspective.The project includes the following milestones:- propose and selection of a concept of a new design;- creation of wireframes for every different page;- design of website pages with description of implementation specifics.In our opinion such a designer:- Has a worthy portfolio which includes examples of wireframes, prototypes and UI design for websites;- Knows principles of designing usable user interfaces;- Knows UI guidelines for different platforms and follows them;- Understands technical aspects that determine design;- Can create tidy wireframes;- Pays attention to every pixel and every color;- Can work according to the existing company visual style;- Understands why requirements are necessary, is ready to study them, discuss and use;- Speaks English, can read and write some documentation in English;- Asks right questions, can listen and hear, constructively accept criticism and argue solution choice;- Shares his/her knowledge, teaches others, but reckons with their opinion.It would be ideal if:- You have experience in designing UI for applications on different platforms (web, mobile, desktop), not only websites (but websites as well);- You work or worked in a specialized organization (design studio);- You can create dynamic GUI prototypes;- You can create beautiful icons of any size;- You are registered as a legal form;- You are interested in time management, goal achievement and management of your life;- You are not quite satisfied with existing tools for task management and scheduling, you need a better one and have desire to participate in its creation.We suggest and also expect from an applicant:- Completely remote job with a free schedule;- Availability from 5 to 15 hours per week (depending on the project stage);- Regular and frequent communications (up to 5 times per week, also via Skype);- Regular and staged demos of results;- Payments according to pre-agreed estimates of tasks and hourly rate;- Long-term collaboration (in the nearest future we shall make improvements of the web application, design of mobile applications, illustrations for blog posts and website).Applying to this job please review the current website and the web application and tell us what you personally could improve in their design (minimum by one item for each of them). We consider only applications with replies to this question and in the presence of portfolio.

title: Write an iPhone application
desc: I have been married for over 30 years and in that time I have made a lot of mistakes in my marriage. I have also done a lot of things right. I have taken all of this real life experience, along with basic life and psychological truths,  and created a simple but comprehensive program to help men improve their marriage and themselves. I call the program The Doghouse which includes a marriage guide and app, and the power of the support from an entire community of men working on improving their marriage and themselves.The program begins with reading or listening to the marriage guide and performing the assignments throughout the manual. In order to coach the user through the guide, the app will remind the user to complete the assigned reading and tasks.Once the user completes the guide, his daily goal will be to refrain from criticizing his wife and to perform the 3 T.A.P. tasks (TAP stands for Time, Appreciation and Passion). The app is designed to assist the user in completing these tasks by:Daily reminders to the user to complete the tasksTracking the user’s task completion success rateAllowing users to share suggestions and ideas that have helped them complete the tasksThe app is also designed to give the user encouragement through the daily reminders, messages upon completion of the daily tasks and regular blog posts.The app even reminds the user of his wife’s birthday and their anniversary and provides gift suggestions as submitted by the users.

title: Commercial website and Android application - 07/11/2017 08:05 EST
desc: Dear Sir/Madam,If I may, I note our requirements here. Please read the entire document thoroughly. We need an android application and a website for distributing specific goods along a large city. It must be something like UberEATS ([url removed, login to view]).Notes:[url removed, login to view] noting the cost of the project please state only the short-time project’s cost now.[url removed, login to view] source code must be available.[url removed, login to view] project must be designed in a way that it definitely completely supports adding the aims of long-term that are not required in the short-term[url removed, login to view] short-term aims must be operational at the same time, but the long-term features can be added at different times by our selection.[url removed, login to view] other aims and conditions may be added but not to the short-term ones. The short-term aim list is static.Short-term requirements:[url removed, login to view] short-term purposes must be completed and presentable in no later than 45 days.[url removed, login to view] website and application must be completely orderly in different modules each one manipulatable for one of the long-term and short-term purposes below. An already designed suitable existing CMS for the website (not be written from scratch) should be used suitable for all the aims both the short-term and long-term.[url removed, login to view] noted action is supposed to be available on both website and mobile application.[url removed, login to view] website and application must be synchronized in real-time.[url removed, login to view] must be 2 types of accounts. One administrator that can manage the content, and another that its accounts are created by customers dynamically.[url removed, login to view] customer will have a personal account and they can order some products from the menu of the shops either from website or mobile application.[url removed, login to view] shop’s list contents will be added and set by the administrator.[url removed, login to view] customer account must be verified and activated by sending a code to either their email or their Telegram ([url removed, login to view]) account requiring it in their accounts, and without activation of course the ordering will not be available. At this stage sending the code via sms is not required. The customers must be noted where the verification code or link has been sent.[url removed, login to view] the notification messages there is no need that the individual name of the customer be written.[url removed, login to view] website’s ftp will be preferably based on Linux and its access will be available to the developer. The developer is welcome to offer other suggestions anyhow.[url removed, login to view] shops will be shown on Google map, which are added by us and customer can either select them from a searchable list or tapping on their sign on Google map. The maps and the list need not be on the same screen.[url removed, login to view] shop should have their individual menus with pictures and explanations about every product from which the customer can pick some and order them.[url removed, login to view] and application must support RTL languages Arabic and Persian too. The translation will be carried out by us. There must be some file that contains every term like “[url removed, login to view]” or “[url removed, login to view]”.[url removed, login to view] must be a contact us page containing the company’s contact information. The contact information will be added by the administrator.[url removed, login to view] the features noted above must be customizable to be manipulated in users’ “settings” section.[url removed, login to view] website should be something like http://www.alopeyk.com.[url removed, login to view] options sign in, register and forgot password must be available in application and website.[url removed, login to view] carrier will be a third party company. When the user finalizes their orders the information will be sent to the carrier company in the form that will be given to you in at most 20 days.[url removed, login to view] will be only one group of goods sold. For instance, sweets.Long-term:Long-term purposes are presentable by email.Best regards,Ali Momen

title: Android IPTV / Media Player App using Exoplayer framework
desc: I need a basic IPTV app based on Exoplayer. This App will be running on an Android 6 based Mediabox.App Feature / Requirements-> The app needs to be able parse standard IPTV .m3u playlist files. Passed as a url bundled with the apps start intent.-> The app also needs to be able to play a video url (any supported by Exoplayer), which can also be passed to it as an intent.-> The app should always play video as full screen.-> App will be running on Android 6 Media Box, so controls (play, channel up down) need to be able to be mapped in code to the appropriate remote control buttons (no touchscreen interfacing is required or possible)-> Basic OSD and Guide info form the m3u files should be displayable on the screen.-> Playback should be paused and resumed by pressing the pause key.-> The App should pause and go into the background when the device goes to sleep (or alternatively as soon as it wakes up again) or by pressing the back button during playback. Calling the initial intent again with the same url should cause it to come to the foreground and resume playing. If the url is different then it should load the new url, being either a new m3u iptv list or video to play directly.-> Enter button should bring up a channel guide as a dialogue window and D-Pad buttons should navigate in the dialog with enter to select channel and back to exit dialog back to playing video.Full source code and compiling instructions for Android Studio will need to be supplied.Some links that might help....App should be similar in function to the Smart IPTV app [url removed, login to view]Some code for m3u parsing (if exoplayer does not support directly) [url removed, login to view]

title: UI/UX Expert
desc: We are looking for our permanent UI/UX expert.We have more than 5 ecommerce mobile applications already live on the app stores. We are now looking for an experienced UI/UX Designer to advise us on updating and creating our mobile applications to make them more user-friendly. We require modern, creative and innovative designs that enhance the user's overall experience in the app.We will start with one project wherein the selected expert UI/UX freelancer will provide suggestions for already existing designs in the form of remodelled designs of the applications. Relevant details of the applications like the brand guidelines and existing designs would be provided.We will judge the candidate based on their designs, working speed, response time and attitude. Based on this, if we like the candidate, we will assign all our future projects to them.We need someone who can work with strict deadlines, clearly follows directions, has a creative eye and a positive attitude.Kindly put 'UIUX-Mobile-Itcan' as first word of your cover to confirm you have read and understood the requirement else we have discard your bid.
